EIP712DomainChanged().details: MAY be emitted to signal that the domain could have changed.

SignerNotMessageSender().notice: Emitted when the signer is not the message sender

SignerNotOwner().notice: Emitted when the signer is not the specified owner

userdoc.notice: This contract handles order submission, which is settled in batch, and removeLiquidity, which can be filled immidiately. Orders are batched since they may affect the pool price, while removeLiquidity does not.
